dataTemplate.name: XXGLNewAcct
dataTemplate.description: R0489 Report displays a list of new accounts added to the general ledger during a given period.

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT ffvv.flex_value gl_account, ffvv.description gl_account_description, ffvv.creation_date gl_account_creation_date FROM fnd_flex_values_vl ffvv, fnd_flex_value_sets ffvs WHERE ffvv.flex_value_set_id = ffvs.flex_value_set_id AND ffvs.flex_value_set_name = 'OD_GL_GLOBAL_ACCOUNT' AND ffvv.creation_date BETWEEN :p_account_creation_from_date AND :p_account_creation_to_date ORDER BY ffvv.flex_value, ffvv.description
